attributeDefinition: Serial number accompanied with the survey year
definition: serial number accompanied with the survey year

attributeDefinition: Serial number of the plot
Location of the plots within the reference site (= control)
factor: sued = south / mitte = center / nord = north / Rollfeld = topsoil removal in reference site

attributeDefinition: Date of the vegetation survey
Average overall height of the total vegetation
Estimated total vegetation cover
Estimated moss cover
Estimated litter cover
Estimated raw soil cover
Height above sea level
Size of the vegetation surveys (rectangular)
Restoration measure either cutted in summer after 01.07. or in autumn after 01.09 or grazed once a year
Year when mowing regime started
Summed cover of all Poaceae species
Total species richness
Species richness of R1A indicator species
Species richness of R22 indicator species
Species richness of R1A and R22 indicator species
Species richness of vulnerable species (see data_processed_traits)
Species richness of near threatened species (see data_processed_traits)
Species richness of endangered species (see data_processed_traits)
Species richness of critically endangered species (see data_processed_traits)
Species richness of rlg_CR + rlg_EN + rlg_VU + rlg_NT
Shannon index (for calculation see _prepare_data.R in the code)
Eveness index calculated: shannon / log(richness_total)
Community-weighted mean (abundance data) of plant height
Community-weighted mean of (abundance data) seed mass in log-transformed gram
Community-weighted mean (abundance data) of specific leaf area of log-transforemed values in squareCentiMeterPerGram
EUNIS habitat type (Chytry et al. 2020) calculated with the ESy of Bruelheide et al. (2021)
factor: R = general grassland / R1A = semi-dry perennial calcareous grassland (meadow steppe) / R22 = Low and medium altitude hay meadow
comment: Chytrý et al. (2020) Appl Veg Sci https://doi.org/10.1111/avsc.12519 / Bruelheide et al. 2021 Appl Veg Sci https://doi.org/10.1111/avsc.12562

attributeDefinition: Botanist who conducted the vegetation survey
definition: Botanist who conducted the vegetation survey

attributeDefinition: Comments
